product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Primaloft Vest - Men's
long_description: The adidas Terrex Swift PrimaLoft Vest for men is light in weight but not in warmth, thanks to PrimaLoft(R) synthetic insulation. Wear it or carry it whenever core warmth may be needed. Lightweight PrimaLoft Sport 60g is breathable, water resistant and super warm even if it does get wet; it's also highly compressible, so it stows easily. 100% nylon ripstop fabric resists rain and wind. Zippered hand pockets in the adidas Terrex Swift PrimaLoft Vest secure essentials.
short_description: The adidas Terrex Swift PrimaLoft Vest for men is light in weight but not in warmth, thanks to PrimaLoft(R) synthetic insulation. Wear it or carry it whenever core warmth may be needed.
